text: (Yewe Muhamadi! Ntuzibwire ko kugera ku ntsinzi byoroshye, kuko n’Intumwa zakubanjirije zitayigezeho ako kanya, ahubwo) izo Ntumwa zageraga aho ziheba zigakeka ko zahakanywe burundu; icyo gihe inkunga yacu ikaba ari bwo izigeraho, maze tukarokora abo dushaka. Kandi ibihano byacu ntibikumirwa ku bantu b’inkozi z’ibibi
